SA15bsa070_u:3_0_0: vādo na kartavyaḥ / kasmāt? prāyeṇa hi vādakārakāṇāṃ sañjātavipulakrodhamadamattānāṃ
SA15bsa070_u:3_2: vādakārakāṇāñcāntaraṃ vastuto mṛdvapi paraṃ bahirbahudoṣaṃ dṛśyate /
SA15bsa070_u:4_0: atrocyate / maivaṃ, naiṣa vādaprārambhaḥ paribhavalābhakhyātyartho 'pi tu sulakṣaṇadurlakṣaṇopadeśecchayaiva vādasya prārambhaḥ /
SA15bsa070_u:5_0: yadīha loke vādo na bhavet, mugdhānāṃ bāhulyaṃ syāt / tataśca laukikamithyājñānakuśalatāsahacarabhrāntisamudbhūtakukarmabhiḥ saṃsāradurgatiḥ sadarthahāniśca /
SA15bsa070_u:6_0: vādāvagame tu svayaṃ sulakṣadurlakṣaṇaśūnyalakṣaṇaparijñānatvāt sarve mārāstīrthikā mithyādṛṣṭimanuṣyāśca viheṭhanāsamarthā (# Uh 4#) apratibandhakārāśca /

SA15bsa070_u:10_2: yathā dhānyamuptvā siktā codakena tasya puṣṭiḥ samṛddhiśca sādhyate /
SA15bsa070_u:10_4: yadi kaścidetamaṣṭāvidhaṃ [vādaṃ] śṛṇuyādarthantu tasya nāvagacchettadā [tasya] sarveṣu vādeṣu saṃśayo bhavet /
SA15bsa070_u:10_5: yadi kaścidetamaṣṭavidhamarthaṃ parijānīyānniyatameva sarvavādadharmāvagame samartho bhavet /
SA15bsa070_u:11_1: atha tīrthikānāṃ vādadharmāḥ santi na vā /
SA15bsa070_u:11_2: atrocyate santyeva / yathā vaiśeṣikāṇāṃ ṣaṭ padārthāḥ /
SA15bsa070_u:11_3: dravyaṃ guṇaḥ sāmānyaṃ viśeṣaḥ karma samavāyaścetyādikavādadharmeṣu svavagateṣvapi parasūtraśāstrāṇāmapratītiḥ /
SA15bsa070_u:12_0: ato vādanayapratipādanārthaṃ prapañcocchedanārthañcaite 'ṣṭavidhā gambhīrāḥ sadvādadharmāḥ saṃkṣepato mayā kathyante /
SA15bsa070_u:12_1: Uh 5#) dṛṣṭāntaḥ siddhānto vākyapraśaṃsā vākyadoṣaḥ pramāṇaṃ prāptakālavākyaṃ hetvābhāso vākchalam /
SA15bsa070_u:13_4: prāptakāla vākyam / yathā yadi pūrvaṃ dhātvāyatanāni vadet /
SA15bsa070_u:13_8: na tu vastuta udakam / yadi vādī svalaṅkṛtairvākyairudakamiti vadettadā sa hetvābhāsaḥ /
SA15bsa070_u:13_9: vākchalaṃ yathā / navakambala ityukte taddūṣayan vadet /

SA15bsa070_u:14_2: atrocyate / dṛṣṭāntavacanaṃ hi yatra pṛthagjanānāmāryāṇāñca buddhisāmyaṃ tadā vaktavyam /
SA15bsa070_u:14_6: apratītau dṛṣṭāntālābhaḥ / āha / kasmātsadartha eva nocyate 'pi tu dṛṣṭāntaḥ /

SA15bsa070_u:17_0: āha / siddhāntadharmāḥ kiyantaḥ / atrocyate / catvāraḥ / sarvasamaḥ sarvabhinna ādau samaḥ paścādbhinna ādau bhinnaḥ paścātsamaśca /
SA15bsa070_u:17_1: āha / adhunā bhavataitāni catvāri lakṣaṇāni vyākhyātavyāni /

SA15bsa070_u:19_13: durbodhaṃ hi sūtram / kutracitsanniti kutracidasanniti kathaṃ tatpratītirityayamādau samaḥ paścādbhinnaḥ /
SA15bsa070_u:19_14: Uh 7#) paścātsamo yathā, (vādī vadeda)ātmātmīyañca na vidyete /
SA15bsa070_u:19_15: prativādī tu vadedastyātmā, asti puruṣaḥ / nirvāṇābhyupagamastrūbhayorvādinoḥ /
SA15bsa070_u:20_1: tadyathā dvādaśa nidānāni, duḥkhaṃ, samudayaḥ, nirodhaḥ, mārgaḥ saptatriṃśatpakṣāḥ, catvāri śrāmaṇyaphalānītyādayo dharmā buddhasya samyagarthā ityucyante /
SA15bsa070_u:21_0: sandhyāpūjā, balidānaṃ, dhūpadīpanaṃ, tailadīpanivedanamiti caturvidhā yājñikatīrthikānāṃ kriyā /

SA15bsa070_u:23_0: oṣadhividyā ṣaḍvidhā / oṣadhināma, oṣadhiguṇaḥ, oṣadhirasaḥ, oṣadhivīryaṃ, sannipātaḥ, vipākaśceti bhaiṣājyadharmāḥ /
SA15bsa070_u:25_0: pradhanasyaikyaṃ puruṣā bahavaḥ / [teṣāṃ ca] vimuktiriti sāṃkhyāḥ /
SA15bsa070_u:26_0: aṣṭau sūkṣmāṇi yathā / catvāri mahābhūtāni buddhirākāśo,
SA15bsa070_u:27_1: nirjarā, sambaraḥ, bandhaḥ, mokṣaḥ / pañcajñānāni [tadyathā] śrutajñānaṃ,
SA15bsa070_u:27_2: Uh 8#) darśanāvaraṇaṃ, duḥkhavedanīyāvaraṇaṃ, mohāvaraṇamāyurāvaraṇaṃ, gotrāvaraṇaṃ, nāmāvaraṇañca / catvāraḥ kaṣāyāḥ [tadyathā] krodhaḥ,
SA15bsa070_u:28_0: apare 'pi santi ye vadanti sarvamekaṃ sadbhāvājjñeyam /
SA15bsa070_u:28_2: kiñca pradhānāt samutpannaṃ sarvamekaṃ jñeyamekamūlatvā ityevamekavādinastīrthikāḥ /
SA15bsa070_u:29_0: apare vadanti / sarvaṃ pṛthak / kuta iti cet / yathā śiraḥpadādi kāyātpṛthak /
SA15bsa070_u:32_0: api ca yathā kecidvadanti nirvāṇabhāvaḥ na duḥkhaṃ na ca sukham /
SA15bsa070_u:32_1: kathaṃ jñātamiti cet / sarve hi dharmāścetanāḥ saduḥkhasukhā nirvāṇaṃ tvacetanaṃ kathaṃ sukhaṃ syāt /
SA15bsa070_u:33_1: kuta iti cet / sukhaṃ trividham / sukhavedanāsukhaṃ, anupaghātaḥ, anākāṅkṣā ca / nirvāṇa ākāṅkṣābhāvānnirvāṇaṃ sukham /
SA15bsa070_u:34_1: api ca nirvāṇaṃ nityamiti mayā pūrvaṃ jñātam /
SA15bsa070_u:34_2: idānīntu [vaktavyaṃ] saṃskārebhyastat pṛthak na veti kecit /
SA15bsa070_u:34_3: atrocyate / nirvāṇaṃ nityamiti pūrvaṃ jñātaṃ kimucyate saṃksāraistattulyam /
SA15bsa070_u:35_0: anyacca kecidāhuḥ / ātmabhāvasya rūpavattve nityo 'nityo vāyamiti na niścīyate /
SA15bsa070_u:36_0: atrocyate / sarvaṃ mūrtamanityameva yathā murto ghaṭo vināśī /
SA15bsa070_u:36_3: yuktihīnañcaitat / yathā ratnabudhyā sikatopalādānaṃ tathā bhavato vacanamatīva mithyā /
SA15bsa070_u:36_4: atha kasmādātmāmurta iti cenmayā pūrvamuktaṃ ghaṭo mūrtatvādvināśīti /
SA15bsa070_u:36_5: yadyātmaivaṃ syāt, tadā so 'pi vināśī bhavet / kathamidānīṃ bhavatā pṛcchyate `kasmādātmāmūrta' iti /
SA15bsa070_u:37_0: aparañca / aniyatasiddhāntalakṣaṇam, yathā kaścit pṛcchet / kiṃ śabdo vastu[bhūto] nityo 'nityo vā /
SA15bsa070_u:38_0: atha kiṃ nāma śabdo vastu[bhūtaḥ] / atrocyate / aniścaye kathaṃ praśnaḥ /
SA15bsa070_u:39_0: atha kiṃ kevala evātmānāgate 'dhvani sukhaduḥkhe vedayate saśarīro vā /
SA15bsa070_u:41_1: nanu ka eṣa ātmā yo 'nāgate 'dhvani sukhaduḥkhe vedayate /
SA15bsa070_u:41_2: atrocyate / 'ātmā, iti pūrvamuktaṃ bhavatā / kathaṃ punaḥ sannasan vātmā' iti pṛcchyate /
SA15bsa070_u:43_2: na hi sarve saṃskārā vijñānamiti tadayuktam /
SA15bsa070_u:44_0: atha sarve dharmāṃ anityāḥ śabdastu naiva sarvaṃ,
SA15bsa070_u:48_0: sampannañca yathā / ātmavādyevaṃ praṣṭavyaḥ / yaduktaṃ bhavatātmeti sa nityo 'nityo vā /
SA15bsa070_u:49_0: atha kiṃ nāmādhikam / atrocyate / adhikaṃ trividham, hetvadhikaṃ, dṛṣṭāntādhikaṃ, vākyādhikañca / yadi kaścidvadecchabdo 'nityaḥ samyogajaḥ /
SA15bsa070_u:49_5: śabdo 'pi tathā / kathaṃ tajjñāyate / oṣṭhamukhādisamudbhavatvāt / tadṛṣṭāntādhikam / yadyucyate 'ṇuḥ sūkṣma ākāśastu vyāpī /
SA15bsa070_u:49_6: ubhāvapi nityau / śabdastu na tathā tasmādanitya etadṛṣṭāntādhikam /
SA15bsa070_u:49_8: nitya iti cet, tadayuktam / kasmāt? dvābhyāṃ hetubhyām / murtodbhavatvādaindriyakatvācca /
SA15bsa070_u:49_9: kathaṃ nitya iti yacca samānadharmakaṃ tatsarvamanityam /
SA15bsa070_u:50_0: atrāha / kīdṛśaṃ vākyaṃ laukikānāṃ pratipādanāya smartham /
SA15bsa070_u:50_1_0: ucyate / yadi mūrkhāya gambhīrārtha vadedyathā sarve dharmā śūnyāḥ śāntā nirātmāno
SA15bsa070_u:50_1_1: niṣpugdalā māyāvat nirmāṇavattattvarahitā ityādi tadā taṃ gambhīrārthaṃ vidvāneva
SA15bsa070_u:50_1_2: jñātuṃ śankoti pṛthagjanastu śrutvā bhrāntyāpanno bhavet /
SA15bsa070_u:50_2: Uh 12#) etadaprāptakālam / athocyate / asti dharmāṇāṃ karma, asti viṣākro 'sti ca bandhamokṣaḍiḥ /
SA15bsa070_u:50_3: yaḥ karoti so 'nubhuṅkta ityalpabuddhayo 'pi śrutvāvagacchanti yathā vedhakāraṇisaṃyogenāgnerūtpattiḥ /
SA15bsa070_u:51_0: atha kiṃ pratipattiḥ / ucyate / abhihitasya bāhulye 'pi smaraṇasāmarthyam,
SA15bsa070_u:51_3: yathā kaścidvadet sarve dharmāḥ śūnyā anīśvarāḥ sarvavastūnāṃ pratītyasamutpannatvāditi pratipattiḥ /
SA15bsa070_u:52_0: atha ke vākyadoṣāḥ / atrocyate / pūrvoktaviparītā vākyadoṣāḥ /
SA15bsa070_u:52_1: vākyadoṣāḥ punardvividhāḥ / kiñca taddvaividhyam / arthasyābhede punaruktiḥ / vākyasya cābhede punaruktiriti /
SA15bsa070_u:52_2: kā nāmaikārthapunaruktiḥ / yathā kauśika ityuktvā punarvadeddevendraḥ śakraḥ purandaro veti /
SA15bsa070_u:53_0: nāmārthatulyatā yathā / indra ityuktvā punarapīndra iti vadet / iyaṃ nāmārthābhede punaruktiḥ /
SA15bsa070_u:54_0: yadalaṅkṛtamasaṅgaṃ voktaṃ sa sarvo vākyadoṣa ityucyate /
SA15bsa070_u:56_0: yathā kaściddevānāmindrasya śakrasya bhāryāṃ praśaṃmayan suvarṇarūpiṇīm //
SA15bsa070_u:57_1: komalapādahastāṃ paścācca śakro devānāmindro 'suratripuravināśīti tu vadannityakramaṃ vacanamuktam /
SA15bsa070_u:58_0: atha katividhaṃ pramāṇam / caturvidhaṃ pramāṇam / pratyakṣamanumānamupamānamāgamaśceti /
SA15bsa070_u:58_2: kutaḥ punaḥ pratyakṣaṃ śreṣṭhamiti cedapareṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ pramāṇānāṃ pratyakṣopajīvakatvācchreṣṭham /
SA15bsa070_u:60_1: yathā rātrau sthāṇuṃ dṛṣṭvā manuṣya eṣa ityucyate /

SA15bsa070_u:60_4_1: vyākhyāyate / anumānaṃ trividhaṃ pūrvavat, śeṣavat, sāmānyato [dṛṣṭaṃ] ca / yathā
SA15bsa070_u:60_4_2: ṣaḍaṅguliṃ sapiḍakamūrdhānaṃ bālaṃ dṛṣṭvā paṣcāddhṛddhaṃ bahuśrutaṃ devadattaṃ dṛṣṭvā
SA15bsa070_u:61_1: Uh 14#) śeṣamapi salilaṃ tulyameva lavaṇamiti / etaccheṣavadanumānam /
SA15bsa070_u:62_0: sāmānyato dṛṣṭaṃ yathā / kaścigdacchaṃstaṃ deśaṃ prāpnoti /
SA15bsa070_u:62_1: gagane 'pi sūryācandramasau pūrvasyāṃ diśyuditau paścimāyāñcāstaṃ gatau /
SA15bsa070_u:62_3: etatsāmānyato dṛṣṭam / nanu kā śrutiḥ / atrocyate, satyaprācīnavṛddhabuddhabodhisattvadarśanādāryasūtradharmaśravaṇagrahaṇayorjñānadarśanotpādasāmarthyameṣā śrutirityucyate /
SA15bsa070_u:62_4: yathā suvaidyako bheṣajakuśalo maitracittena śikṣakaḥ suśruta ityucyate /
SA15bsa070_u:64_0: atha kimupamānalakṣaṇam / atrocyate / yathā sarve dharmā śūnyāḥ śāntā māyāvat nirmāṇavat /
SA15bsa070_u:64_1: saṃjñādāntāśvavat, saṃskārāḥ kadalīvat, kāmalakṣaṇaṃ piḍakavat viṣavat /
SA15bsa070_u:64_2: etadupamānamucyate / evaṃ catvāro hetavaḥ / tadavagamanaṃ hetujñānamityuktam /
SA15bsa070_u:65_0: atha ke hetvābhāsāḥ / atrācyate / hetvābhāsā eteṣu vādadharmesu mahādoṣā eva jñeyāḥ /
SA15bsa070_u:67_1: yathā kaścidāha / yo maya parihitaḥ sa navakambalaḥ /
SA15bsa070_u:67_2: atra dūṣaṇaṃ (vadet) yadbhavatā parihitaṃ tadekameva vastraṃ kathaṃ naveti /
SA15bsa070_u:67_3: atra prativedenmayā nava ityuktaṃ tathāca navaḥ kambalaḥ natu naveti /
SA15bsa070_u:67_4: atra dūṣayetkathaṃ nava? navalomairnirmitatvānnava ityukte prativādī vadet tattvato 'parimitāni lomāni kathaṃ navalomānītyucyate /
SA15bsa070_u:68_0: atrāha / nava iti mayā pūrvamuktaṃ na tu navasaṃkhyā /
SA15bsa070_u:68_1: atra dūṣaṇam / tadvastraṃ yuṣmākameveti jñātaṃ kasmādetanna vaḥ kathyate /
SA15bsa070_u:68_2: atrottaram / mayā nava ityuktaṃ kintu na va iti noktam /
SA15bsa070_u:68_3: atra dūṣaṇam / bhavataḥ kāyaṃ kambalo vasta iti pratyakṣametat /
SA15bsa070_u:69_0: aparañca vākchalam / yathā girirdahyata ityukte, dūṣaṇam / tattvatastṛṇataravo dahyante kathaṃ girirdahyata ityuktam /
SA15bsa070_u:70_0: api ca chalaṃ dvividhaṃ / pūrvavat sāmānyañceti / yathā / saṃskṛtā dharmāḥ śrūnyāḥ śāntā ākāśavadityukte,
SA15bsa070_u:70_2: tadā niḥsvabhāvā dharmā ākāśatulyā iti sāmānyachalam /
SA15bsa070_u:71_0: kā tāvadutpattiriti / atrocyate / sata utpattiriti / yathā mṛdo ghaṭatvattvāddhaṭotpādakatvam /
SA15bsa070_u:71_1: yadi mṛdo ghaṭatvavattvaṃ tadā mṛdeva ghaṭaḥ syāt /
SA15bsa070_u:71_5: Uh 16#) syāt / yadyudakasya sadbhāvena ghaṭānutpādakatvaṃ kathaṃ tarhi mṛdo ghaṭotpādakatvam /
SA15bsa070_u:72_1: ucyate / sthāṇormanuṣyasādṛśyāt, rātrau taṃ dṛṣṭvā, eṣa sthāṇuḥ puruṣo veti vimarśaḥ /
SA15bsa070_u:73_3: atra dūṣaṇam / idānīṃ bhavatā śabdasya nityatākāraṇamapratiṣṭhāpya kathaṃ vedo nitya ityucyate /
SA15bsa070_u:74_3: yathā gṛhe dagdha udākānveṣaṇaṃ bhavatopyevamiti kālātītaḥ /
SA15bsa070_u:75_0: atha ko nāma prakaraṇasamaḥ? (ātmanaḥ) śarīra bhinnatvādātmā nityaḥ /
SA15bsa070_u:76_4: tadā (ghaṭasya) śarīrabhinnatvādvaṭo 'pi nityaḥ syāt śarīrabhinnatve 'pi ghaṭo 'nitya iti cet,
SA15bsa070_u:77_0: ko nāma varṇyasamaḥ / ucyate / yathā nityamākāśamasparśatvāt /
SA15bsa070_u:78_0: kaḥ savyabhicāraḥ / ucyate / yathā pañcaviṣayā anityā (#
SA15bsa070_u:78_1: Uh 17#) indriyagrāhyatvāt / catvāri mahābhūtānyapi tathā tasmādanityāni /
SA15bsa070_u:79_0: atra dūṣaṇam / kūrmaroma lavaṇagandhaśca nirābhāsamātraṃ manovijñānopalabhyatvātkimanityamiti savyabhicāraḥ /
SA15bsa070_u:80_0: atha ko nāma viruddhaḥ / ucyate / viruddho dvividhaḥ / dṛṣṭāntaviruddho yuktiviruddhaśca /
SA15bsa070_u:81_0: yuktiviruddho yathā, brāhmaṇasya kṣatrakarmānupālanaṃ mṛgayādiśikṣā ca,
SA15bsa070_u:85_0: pūrvamaṣṭavidhā vādadharmā uktāḥ / atha nigraha[sthāna]dharmān vakṣyāmaḥ /
SA15bsa070_u:86_0: nanu katame vādadharmāḥ / (atrocyate) yathā catvāri mahābhūtāni prajñaptireva /
SA15bsa070_u:86_1: kasmāt / rūpādidharmatvādeva / aparaḥ punarāha / catvāri mahābhūtāni tattvataḥ santi /
SA15bsa070_u:86_3: tatsaditi jñeyam / etacca prativiruddham / tasmādvivādaḥ / yathā vā / pṛthivī śarīrakāraṇameva / aparāṇi mahābhūtānyapi tathā /
